ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a common problem, more and more have started to zone crash every second time the zone. I know VI is looking into this.
ygData.messageBody:
This is a common problem, more and more have started to zone crash every
second time the zone. I know VI is looking into this.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Mad Macinchaote [SMTP:scendera@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 5:20 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
>
> Odd...mine started after a patch, went on til I raised cain about it, then
> was fixed after a GM said it would be. No sound card changes on either
> side and it's worked fine since. The card in question is an AWE64 gold
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Nygaard, Jeff <mailto:jnygaard@...>
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 9:39 AM
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
>
> I would bet this crashing when she zones is a sound card problem. I
> would
> suggest disable the sound card, start eq and try zoning. If she
> zones fine
> and does not crash, she'll need to buy a better sound card. I had
> the same
> problem, switched sound cards and it was solved.
>
>
>       -----Original Message-----
>       From:      John_Miewald@...
> <mailto:John_Miewald@...>
> [SMTP:John_Miewald@...]
>       Sent:      Friday, May 25, 2001 11:12 AM
>       To:      EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>       Subject:      [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
>
>
>       I have a friend who is having an unusually difficult time
> signing on
> and
>       staying online.  It seems that just about any time she zones,
> you
> can
>       assume she will not be on anymore.
>
>       Is this a common problem?  Does anyone have some "quick fix"
> ideas
> that
>       might keep her from being punted so easily?
>
>       Thanks for any help.
>
>       "Alazais"
>
>
>       Visit the EverQuest homepage at <http://www.everquest.com>
